alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:40PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON...MEADE...SOUTHEASTERN HANCOCK...CENTRAL HARDIN AND CENTRAL BRECKINRIDGE COUNTIES... At 540 PM EDT/440 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Brandenburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Brandenburg, Hardinsburg, Radcliff, Webster, Vine Grove, Irvington, Muldraugh, West Point and Ekron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
